title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Elevate Streaming Quality with AI: Prime Video's Innovative Approach (AMZ306)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI提升流媒体质量：Prime Video的创新方法 (AMZ306)
abstract: Learn how Prime Video leverages AI to transform global streaming experiences. We'll demonstrate our innovative use of generative AI to enhance quality for premium content like NBA and NFL games. Explore our cutting-edge AI system for artwork and quality moderation, built on AWS services including Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q. Discover how these solutions maintain exceptional quality of experience across millions of concurrent streams worldwide.
abstract_cn: 了解Prime Video如何利用AI转变全球流媒体体验。我们将展示创新性地使用生成式AI来提升NBA和NFL比赛等优质内容的质量。探索我们基于AWS服务构建的前沿AI系统，包括Amazon Bedrock和Amazon Q，用于艺术作品和质量审核。了解这些解决方案如何在全球数百万并发流中保持卓越的体验质量。
